title: Weird LP gains???
body:
I've been on a huge win-streak in SoloQ, winning 10 out of my last 12 games (so an 83% win-rate). I was comfortably gaining 20+ LP per win, but for some reason it has suddenly dropped down to 13 LP.

Why did this happen?? If anything, shouldn't it have gone up???

Thanks :)

replies.body:
Generally gaining less LP from wins means your MMR is lower than it should be, so you gain less from winning and lose more from losing. Which leads to elo hell.

Yes you're on a win streak lately but before that you lost 11 out of 12 soloQ games. 

Reckon that might have something to do with it.
I though so too, but in my recent 12 games, 9 of the wins gave me 20+ LP and the most recent one only gave me 13 LP.

> [{quoted}](name=Percival9,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GrH04fLs,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-18T08:06:26.228+0000)
>
> I though so too, but in my recent 12 games, 9 of the wins gave me 20+ LP and the most recent one only gave me 13 LP.

Have you been duoing with someone lately? If yes then no doubt your friend has better mmr which boosted your average mmr between the both of you. For example (this did happen to me lol in a good way i suppose) I was smurfing with like my silver 3 account which had mmr of a gold and my friend was in gold at that time with really good mmr (forgot which elo). When we duo-ed despite our elos we managed to queue up against plats-low diamonds. So its possible that if you did duo then you were just sitting on their mmr <- not saying it in a negative way ;-; I feel like it sounds negative when u say it. But earning 13 lp is definitely an indication that your mmr has dropped a  lot lower than the average as in demotion if close to 0 lp or on a losing streak.
Good luck buddy I believe in you!

Thanks :)

I was just looking at my OP.GG because I won another game and only got 12 LP this time.
Does it have something to do with the fact everyone in my game in B5 but I'm B4???

That's a safe bet. Once matchmaking raises your MMR, you'll find yourself against more formidable opponents and also gain more LP with your victories and lose less LP in your losses. 

You can read more on the Matchmaking Guide:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide
